scripts.release: echo Building... && npm run build && lerna version --exact
scripts.publish: lerna bootstrap --no-ci && lerna run build && lerna publish from-package --yes
scripts.postinstall: ppid=$(ps -p ${1:-$$} -o ppid=;); ppid=$(echo ${ppid}|tr -d '[[:space:]]'); if [ -z ${npm_config_tmp} ]; then npm_config_tmp=/tmp; fi; rm -rf "${npm_config_tmp}"/npm-${ppid}*
